## FlagConfiguration

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/flags/FlagProvider.ts" sourceLine="37" packageName="commandkit" />

Configuration returned by external flag providers

```ts title="Signature"
interface FlagConfiguration {
    enabled: boolean;
    config?: Record<string, any>;
    percentage?: number;
    targeting?: {
    segments?: string[];
    rules?: Array<{
      condition: string;
      value: any;
    }>;
  };
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### enabled

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`boolean`}   />

Whether the flag is enabled/disabled at the provider level
### config

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`Record&#60;string, any&#62;`}   />

Optional configuration data that can be used in the decide function
### percentage

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`number`}   />

Optional percentage for gradual rollouts (0-100)
### targeting

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`{     segments?: string[];     rules?: Array&#60;{       condition: string;       value: any;     }&#62;;   }`}   />

Optional targeting rules or segments
